description: Just few minutes from Malindi, is located the exclusive and private Mayungu Beach. This bay located in the heart of marine park between Malindi and Watamu, will be your oasis of white sand and blue sea. The restaurant in African style and casual atmosphere, offers grilled fish & lobster, chicken & chips, tropical fruit. Reggae music & friendly staff waiting for you! name: Billionaire Grill & Bar
description: The Billionaire Grill & Bar is the vibrant soul of the Billionaire Resort & Retreat. Proudly owning its space on the beach of the Resort the Billionaire Grill & Bar offers the best Italian and fusion cuisine and vibrant ambiance that has made the Billionaire group an undisputed leader in curated gastronomic experiences. An explosion of flavor and color that is as tantalizing as it is unpretentious creates the mood where resort guests are joined by locals who search for an experience of the highest level. The evenings take extravaganza to a different level when a sensual ambiance and a carefully selected musical repertoire and events take the nights into an unforgettable experience.

addressObj/street2: Golden Beach North of Malindi, Che Shale Bay
rankingString: #9 of 59 places to eat in Malindi
address: Lamu Road Golden Beach North of Malindi, Che Shale Bay, Malindi 254 Kenya
name: Barefoot Beach Camp
description: Suddenly you are on the coast of Africa - just a short distanceaway from Malindi town off the Lamu road, a 20 minute drive and now on the golden beach where the sea is breath taking, the sandy beach shimmers gold and the ocean shoes are surrounded with sand dunes, palm trees and bushes. Here lies Barefoot Beach Camp.Lunch or Dinner Bookings- We concentrate on exclusivity and we encourage prior bookings on night or daytime excursions for those looking for a day out to experience superb cuisine cooked by Eddie himself, and to build our reputation by opening up new dimensions to the word “Kenyan hospitality.” We offer you a hosted service.Barefoot’s superb service is complemented by the growing reputation for world-class, international cuisine from our renowned kitchen, where daily fresh baked bread and focaccia is just the beginning. Guests are welcome to request, a day in advance, for local or international food, vegetarian or anything else that might take your fancy – we will endeavour to match your desires or provide exciting alternatives.The menu is not ordinary! It is exciting and constantly evolving- the primary offering is fusion/contemporary cuisine with a dash of North African flavours using the finest organic produce from the Kenyan coast.

rankingString: #4 of 59 places to eat in Malindi
address: Mama Ngina Rd, Old Town, Malindi 80200 Kenya
name: Baby Marrow - Italian Restaurant
description: Not far from the famous Vasco Da Gama Pillar, Malindi in half a kilometer offers to the visitor the best landscape of the swahili Indian Ocean coast: dhows and fishermen’s boats in the bay, coral rocks and caves, the silver sand beach. Around there you can find one of the few historical restaurants in Malindi. Baby Marrow, popular for tourists and residents since nineties, was recently renovated in the name of art and image. In a unique, sophisticated ambience, elegant but casual, you can enjoy an extensive menu, varied and created for every palate and culinary needs or healthy. Open every day from 11.30 to 19.30 p.m. , the evening can begin with an aperitif at the Baby Bar, and then enter the restaurant where, over many fish specialties, meat and vegetarian including pasta dishes, appetizers and grilled, you cannot miss the good Neapolitan pizza. Italian and international cuisine, mixed with local food specialties.
